text: Myo Cheong (Hangul: 묘청, Hanja:妙淸, ?-1135) was a Korean Buddhist monk, politician, and philosopher during the Goryeo Dynasty. His other name was Jungshim. Myo cheong was from Pyongyang. Although he was a Buddhist, he performed divination and prophecy. == References == * http://100.daum.net/encyclopedia/view.do?docid=b07m4489a * http://koreandb.nate.com/history/people/detail?sn=7608 Category:Year of birth unknown Category:1135 deaths Category:Korean philosophers Category:Korean politicians Category:Buddhist monks Category:Occultists Category:People from Pyongyang
title: Myocheong
